document.full_text: desi bouterse, a former military ruler who has been convicted of drug trafficking and is still on trial for official killings in the 1980s, is once again suriname's leader.
document.title: returned to power, a leader celebrates a checkered past
lines_and_colors: desi bouterse, a former military ruler who has been convicted of drug trafficking and is still on trial for official killings in the 1980s, is once again suriname's leader.
